entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:18 PM MST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Blizzard near the Richardson mountains this afternoon. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains this morning. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 early this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 44 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Blizzard near the Richardson mountains. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Blizzard near the Richardson mountains in the morning. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains in the afternoon. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the morning. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 March 2023
